ga
Class GeneFactory

java.lang.Object
  ga.GeneFactory

public abstract class GeneFactory
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract factory for getting hold of implementing Gene objects. Genes from the genes package can be instantiated by name or at random. A listing of all currently available genes can be retreived to. Currently all reflection exceptions are supressed.

Author:
Matt Oates
See Also:
ga.genes

getGene

public static Gene getGene(java.lang.String name)
Get a gene implementation by name.

Parameters:
name - The class name that should be instantiated.
Returns:
An instantiated copy of the gene requested.

getGene

public static Gene getGene(java.lang.String name,
                           int allele)
Get a gene by name and set its allele to a specified value.

Parameters:
name - The class name of the implementing class to retrieve.
allele - The allele to be set.
Returns:
A new instance of the requested gene.

getRandomGene

public static Gene getRandomGene()
From all the available gene implementations return a new random instance of one.

Returns:
The new gene instance.
